nodes.text: As you reach for the clapper, the air grows cold. A spectral figure materializes.

nodes.speaker: Archivist Shade
nodes.text: I am the keeper of what must not be known.

nodes.speaker: Archivist Shade
nodes.text: This clapper seals a memory. A wound that time has tried to heal.

nodes.speaker: Archivist Shade
nodes.text: You seek to restore your village. But restoration requires forgetting.

nodes.speaker: Archivist Shade
nodes.text: Truth is a weapon. Memory is a wound. I guard both.

nodes.speaker: Archivist Shade
nodes.text: If you take it to seal the memory, you choose blindness.

nodes.speaker: Archivist Shade
nodes.text: If you break the seal, you choose suffering.

nodes.speaker: Archivist Shade
nodes.text: Prove you are worthy of this burden.
The Archivist Shade readies itself for battle.

nodes.speaker: Archivist Shade
nodes.text: You are... strong. Stronger than I expected.

nodes.speaker: Archivist Shade
nodes.text: I have guarded this memory for centuries. Now my duty ends.

nodes.speaker: Archivist Shade
nodes.text: The choice is yours now. I can no longer decide.
The Archivist Shade fades into mist. The clapper lies before you.
